Replace.Text: Can only be constructed by Military Engineers. Does not cost a charge, but does cost 1 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron and 1 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal. Greatly improves [ICON_Movement] Movement speed of any unit moving from one Railroad tile to another. [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes traveling over Railroads can multiply the [ICON_Gold] Gold they get from districts at their destination.
